meanings.definition: The quality or state of being inseparable.
meanings.sent1: The inseparabilities of the twins were evident in how they always did everything together.
meanings.sent2: The inseparabilities of the magnets made it impossible to pull them apart.
meanings.sent3: The inseparabilities of the peanut butter and jelly sandwich led to a messy but delicious situation.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship had inseparabilities like a strong bond that could not be broken.
meanings.sent5: The inseparabilities of the puzzle pieces made it challenging to complete the picture.

meanings.definition: The condition of being unable to be separated or divided.
meanings.sent1: The inseparabilities of the two colors in the paint created a beautiful blend.
meanings.sent2: The inseparabilities of the ingredients in the recipe ensured a perfect dish every time.
meanings.sent3: The inseparabilities of the socks in the laundry caused a mystery of missing pairs.
meanings.sent4: The inseparabilities of the team members made them a formidable force on the field.
meanings.sent5: The inseparabilities of the words in the poem conveyed a deep and meaningful message.
